For future info, you should know that attendance is counted for all credited courses, regardless of whether it's reflected on the app. The app has always been inconsistent with showing the correct attendance (even before my time, so it's an ages old issue), so never go by the app and always track attendance yourself as much as possible. Remember that the app might not show the right attendance but it does store it when the profs record it.
